profile.name: Ben Sadeghipour
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Web Application Security Expert | Remote
profile.summary: Highly motivated and experienced software engineer with a passion for web application security. Skilled in multiple programming languages, including Python, Ruby, PHP, and JavaScript. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions while maintaining a strong focus on security.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Developed and maintained multiple web application security tools using Python, including burpy and SecLists.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement secure software solutions.
Conducted regular security assessments and penetration testing to identify vulnerabilities.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple web applications using Ruby, PHP, and JavaScript.
Conducted security assessments for clients' web applications using burpy and SecLists.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and updated the HTB-Test framework for web application security testing.
Contributed to the development of new features and bug fixes.

experience.title: Udemy Course Developer
description: Developed a comprehensive Udemy course on PHP web application security.
Created engaging video content and accompanying study materials.

experience.title: Shell Scripting Enthusiast
description: Developed shell scripts using crtndstry and lazyrecon for automation tasks.
Experimented with different scripting languages and techniques.
